These pants are comfortable and very breathable. Great for yoga or just wearing casually. I was worried the high elastic waste and would be itchy but it isn’t. There’s disagreement in the quality of the fabric over the years, so I only ordered one pair. I find the fabric to be soft and smooth, much like pajama pants. The seams look solid, and the color is vivid, while not overpowering. I am 5’10’ and the cuffs sit right above my ankle bone, and I can pair them with ankle boots. I’m a true large waist, with junk in my trunk- and the large fits perfectly. (I’ll update this post if they shrink in the wash). So far with the quality, comfort and style- these will be great for lounging, running errands, and going out.
